item.title: Show HN：Defuddle，可读性的HTML-TO-MARKDOWN替代品
item.description:
Defuddle是我构建的开源JS库，用于解析和从网页中提取主要内容和元数据。 It can also return the content as Markdown.I built Defuddle while working on Obsidian Web Clipper[1] (also MIT-licensed) because Mozilla's Readability[2] appears to be mostly abandoned, and didn't work well for many sites.It's still very much a work in progress, but I thought I'd share it today, in light of the announcement that Mozilla is shutting down Pocket.该库可能对建立一个读取式应用程序的任何人有帮助。 defuddle也可以作为CLI提供： https://github.com/github.com/kepano/kepano/kepano/kepano/defefuddle-cli-cli-cli-cli-cli-cli-cli-cli/defefdle-cli-cli href =“ https://github.com/obsidianmd/obsidian-clipper”> https://github.com/obsidianmd/obsidian-clipper [2] https://github.com/mozilla/mozilla/redarbility
注释url： https://news.ycombinator.com/item？id=440674409 点：109 ＃评论：19
